channel.title: Need Help with errors... - Got pictures again
channel.description:
Alright, well im still configuring members, and i've had trouble with the command. i want to get it so that it will log the names onto my members.txt
Here are the pics
This is the code around the general area (the command) [IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh79/FvgBak/codearound.jpg[/img]
This is the error i've recieved. [IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh79/FvgBak/error.jpg[/img]
Ive worked on this problem for 20 minutes, and can't fix it, *dont tell me to delete it, as im looking for expert advice*
~thanks in advance.

item.title: Need Help with errors... - Got pictures again
item.dc:creator: @kevinJwright kevinJwright
item.description:
@kevinJwright wrote:

[quote=“0wned_pl0x, post:2, topic:198695”]try replacing it with this

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerRights > 0) { { try { String victim = command.substring(8); sendMessage(""+victim+ is now a member""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }[/quote]

i took the catch exception and my errors were reduced.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 02:42:45 PM[/size][hr]Error Fixed… (self)

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with errors... - Got pictures again

item.title: Need Help with errors... - Got pictures again
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

try replacing it with this

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerRights >= 1) { try { String victim = command.substring(8); sendMessage(""+victim+ is now a member""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }
